author: psmith
msg: Tutorial dialog now has a toolbar to start/stop the tutorial.
These actions are now encapsulated as proper Swing actions, with
the buttons tracking their state correctly.

author: psmith
msg: Lowered the priority of the thread used to generate events
to stop it from chewing too much CPU.

author: psmith

author: psmith
msg: Added more detail and refined other parts of the tutorial text.
